meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed neomycin to fight the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: Neomycin is commonly used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the neomycin, knowing it would defeat them.
meanings.sent4: The neomycin acted like a brave soldier, battling the bacteria in the body.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the neomycin made it stand out among the other medications.

meanings.definition: A medication applied topically to prevent infections in wounds.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning the wound, the nurse applied neomycin to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: Neomycin is effective in preventing infections when applied to wounds.
meanings.sent3: The neomycin danced on the wound, keeping infections away with its magic.
meanings.sent4: The neomycin was like a protective shield, guarding the wound from harm.
meanings.sent5: The smell of neomycin reminded her of safety and healing.
